select attendance_seq.nextval from dual
insert into attendance_info(attendance_id,attendance_content,attendance_desc,attendance_state,attendance_time,student_id) values(#{aid},#{content},#{desc},#{state},#{time},#{student.id})
mapper.select: select a.*,s.student_id stid,s.student_name from attendance_info a left join student_info s on a.student_id=s.student_id
select a.*,s.student_id stid,s.student_name from attendance_info a left join student_info s on a.student_id=s.student_id where s.student_name like '%${name}%'
mapper.update: update attendance_info set attendance_content=#{content}, attendance_desc=#{desc}, attendance_state=#{state}, attendance_time=#{time}, student_id=#{student.id} where attendance_id=#{aid}
